skills.name: Shepherd of Souls
skills.effect_radius: {{tt|1000|Grave summon range}} / {{tt|2500|Grave despawn range, pending for test}}
skills.blurb: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.
description: {{sbc|Innate- Final Service:}} '''Yorick''' raises a ''grave'' for every enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} and {{pp|12th;6th;2nd|1;7;13}} non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}}. Only 4 ''graves'' can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest. Large monsters that die near '''Yorick''' always leave a ''grave''.
'''Yorick''' can use {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}} and {{ais|Mourning Mist|Yorick}} mark to raise a {{as|Mist Walker|mist}} from each ''grave''.
{{sbc|Innate - The Horde:}} Only 4 {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} can be active on the battlefield at a time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate- Final Service: Yorick raises a grave for every enemy champion, large monster and 1;7;13 ‒ undefined non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with Yorick's Last Rites. Only 4 graves can exist at the same time, with the furthest ones being replaced by the newest. Large monsters that die near Yorick always leave a grave.
Yorick can use Yorick's Awakening and Yorick's Mourning Mist mark to raise a Mist Walker from each grave.
Innate - The Horde: Only 4 Mist Walkers can be active on the battlefield at a time, with the closest ones being replaced by the newest.
skills.notes: * Units dying to {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}} don't lower ''Shepherd of Souls''' counter.

skills.name: Last Rites
skills.blurb: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' curses his shovel, empowering his next [[basic attack]] within 5 seconds to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}}, gain {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and {{tip|heal}} him for {{pp|12;14;16;18;20;22;26;30;34;38;42;46;52;58;64;70;76;82|formula = 10+2 per level up to 6,+4 per level up to 12, and+6 per level up to 18}}, doubled to {{pp|24;28;32;36;40;44;52;60;68;76;84;92;104;116;128;140;152;164|formula = 20 + 4 per level up to 6, + 8 per level up to 12, and + 12 per level up to 18}} if he is {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
If there are at least 3 ''graves'' nearby and ''Last Rites'' is active or on {{sti|cooldown}}, '''Yorick''' is granted the ability to cast ''{{ai|Awakening|Yorick}}''.
''Last Rites'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Yorick's''' basic attack timer.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yorick curses his shovel, empowering his next basic attack within 5 seconds to have an uncancelable windup, gain 50 bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and heal him for 12;14;16;18;20;22;26;30;34;38;42;46;52;58;64;70;76;82undefined − (based on level), doubled to 24;28;32;36;40;44;52;60;68;76;84;92;104;116;128;140;152;164undefined − (based on level) if he is below 50% maximum health.
If there are at least 3 graves nearby and Last Rites is active or on cooldown, Yorick is granted the ability to cast Yorick's Awakening.
Last Rites resets Yorick's basic attack timer.

effects.str: • Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 40% AD)

skills.name: Awakening
skills.blurb: Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' exhumes a {{as|Mist Walker|mist}} under his command from each nearby ''grave''.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Yorick exhumes a Mist Walker under his command from each nearby grave.
skills.notes:
* ''Awakening'' counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Mist Walkers'' update their [[champion statistic|statistics]] correspondingly to '''Yorick's ''' during the periodic stat update, with the exception of their {{as|maximum health}}.
* ''Awakening'' cannot be cast without enough ''graves'' in '''range'''.

skills.name: Dark Procession
skills.effect_radius: {{tt|225|Spirits spawn radius}} / {{tt|200|Sight radius from center of ring}}
skills.blurb: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' summons a wall of spirits around the target location which arises after {{fd|0.75}} seconds, lasting for up to 4 seconds, acting as impassible terrain to enemies, and also granting {{tip|sight}} inside the ring. Enemies within the wall's perimeter at the time of its summon are {{tip|airborne|knocked aside}} over {{fd|0.25}} seconds; within {{tt|210 units|Estimated}}, they are pulled inside, outside this radius they are pushed away.

''Dark Procession'' can only be targeted by enemy {{tip|champion}} basic attacks and {{tip|turret|turrets}}. The wall takes 1 [[damage]] per attack from champions and is destroyed instantly from turret attacks.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yorick summons a wall of spirits around the target location which arises after 0.75 seconds, lasting for up to 4 seconds, acting as impassible terrain to enemies, and also granting sight inside the ring. Enemies within the wall's perimeter at the time of its summon are knocked aside over 0.25 seconds; within 210 units, they are pulled inside, outside this radius they are pushed away.
Dark Procession can only be targeted by enemy champion basic attacks and turrets. The wall takes 1 damage per attack from champions and is destroyed instantly from turret attacks.
skills.notes:
* ''Dark Procession'' has a {{tip|turret}} prioritization value of 6, equal to that of {{ui|Blue Super Minion|link = super minion|super minions}}.
** '''Yorick's''' other {{tip|pet|pets}} each have a lower prioritization value, allowing him to delay the turret from targeting the {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|The Maiden}} or a {{as|Mist Walker|mist}} for one attack.
* ''Dark Procession'' deals 0 {{tip|proc damage|proc}} {{tip|true damage}} to enemies it knocks aside, which triggers [[combat status|in-combat]] effects such as drawing turret and [[Monster#Monster_Behavior|monster aggression]], {{ri|Sudden Impact}} or applying {{ii|Night Harvester}} and {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}}.
* The perimeter is made up of 18 units with 100 {{tip|pathing radius}} and 20 {{tip|gameplay radius}} each.
* Repeatedly while the cage persists, all enemy {{tip|champions}} inside it become marked for '''Yorick''' to gain an {{tip|takedown|assist}} on them should they perish within the standard 10 seconds assist time.

skills.name: Mourning Mist
skills.blurb: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing {{as|15% of target's '''current''' health}} {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within the area, down to a minimum threshold.

Enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} and {{tip|monster|monsters}} hit by the Black Mist are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds, and are ''marked'' for 4 seconds, during which they take 40% '''bonus''' damage from 8 attacks by {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} and continuously raise a {{as|Mist Walker|mist}} from each nearby ''grave'', up to a maximum of 4. '''Yorick''', {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} and the {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|The Maiden}} gain {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards nearby ''marked'' enemies. ''Marked'' {{tip|champion|champions}} are also {{tip|sight|revealed}}.
{{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} will {{tip|dash|leap}} to nearby ''marked'' enemy champions and large monsters, dealing {{as|100% of their AD}} upon arrival.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yorick hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area at the target location, dealing 15% of target's current health magic damage to all enemies within the area, down to a minimum threshold.
Enemy champions and monsters hit by the Black Mist are slowed by 30% for 2 seconds, and are marked for 4 seconds, during which they take 40% bonus damage from 8 attacks by Mist Walkers and continuously raise a Mist Walker from each nearby grave, up to a maximum of 4. Yorick, Mist Walkers and the Yorick's The Maiden gain 20% bonus movement speed when moving towards nearby marked enemies. Marked champions are also revealed.
Mist Walkers will leap to nearby marked enemy champions and large monsters, dealing 100% of their AD upon arrival.
skills.notes:
* '''Yorick''' will snap his facing direction towards the target location at the start of the cast time.
* The speed boost toward marked targetes does not require {{tip|sight}} of them.
* The {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} do not {{tip|dash|leap}} if they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}, or if the ''marked'' target is {{tip|untargetable}}.

effects.str: • Minimum Magic Damage: (+ 70% AP)

skills.name: Eulogy of the Isles
skills.blurb: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' summons the ''Maiden of the Mist'' surrounded by a number of {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or '''Yorick''' dies. ''Eulogy of the Isles'' can be recast once while ''The Maiden of the Mist'' is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Yorick''' sets ''The Maiden of the Mist'' free, allowing her to push the nearest [[lanes|lane]] until she dies.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist surrounded by a number of Mist Walkers at the target location, which remain on the battlefield until she or Yorick dies. Eulogy of the Isles can be recast once while The Maiden of the Mist is alive after 10 seconds of the activation.
Recast: Yorick sets The Maiden of the Mist free, allowing her to push the nearest lanes until she dies.
skills.notes:
* See the ''Pets'' section below for more details about ''The Maiden of the Mist'' and {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}}.
* The extra {{as|Mist Walkers|mist}} spawn 250 units from the ''Maiden'' summon location.
* The ''Maiden'' updates her stats when '''Yorick's''' [[champion statistic|stats]] change.
* When '''Yorick''' dies, ''The Maiden'' rapidly loses portions of her {{as|'''maximum''' health}} over 3 seconds until she dies.
** The loss of {{as|'''maximum''' health}} occurs in {{fd|0.6}}-second intervals, in which she loses 20% on the first, 25% on the second, {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}%}} on the third, 50% on the fourth, and 100% on the fifth.
* '''Yorick''' will snap his facing direction towards the target location at the start of the cast time.
skills.flavorsound:
{{sm2|Yorick.spellR1.ogg|''"Behold the horrors of the isles!"''}}
{{sm2|Yorick.spellR7.ogg|''"The mist takes all!"''}}
